meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds derived from urea.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study ureides to learn more about organic compounds.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician identified the ureides in the sample.
meanings.sent3: The ureides in the experiment seemed to have a party of their own!
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of ureides was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The smell of ureides lingered in the air, unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A compound formed by the condensation of urea with another compound.
meanings.sent1: The chemist synthesized a new ureides compound in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The ureides compound showed promising results in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The ureides compound and the other chemicals danced together in the beaker.
meanings.sent4: Their partnership was as strong as the bond between ureides.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the ureides compound was mesmerizing under the microscope.
